titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Jerry "Scooter" Ebel collection, 1973-1975 MS 827
titlestmt.author: Norie Guthrie

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-10-11 17:10:01 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.abstract: This collection consists of posters collected by Jerry "Scooter" Ebel.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Jerry "Scooter" Ebel worked at music venues like Liberty Hall in the 1970s. During this time, he collected letter press posters. Many of posters in our Liberty Hall collection (MS 658) come from Ebel.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of posters collected by Jerry "Scooter" Ebel.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.
Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Additional materials are not expected for this collection.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Jerry "Scooter" Ebel in April 2018.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jerry "Scooter" Ebel collection, 1973-1975, MS 827, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Please see the Liberty Hall collection, MS 658.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Jerry "Scooter" Ebel collection, must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library.

The Woodson Research Center use policy is that researchers assume sole responsibility for any infringement of privacy, literary rights, copyrights, or other rights arising from their use of the archival materials. In addition to any restrictions placed by donors, certain kinds of archival materials are restricted for the life of the creator plus 50 years. These materials include, but are not limited to, student grades, transcripts, and any job applications or recommendations.

scopecontent.p: Listed performers include: Vince Bell, Cypress Swamp Stompers, Reb Smith, Bill and Lucille Cade, Circus, Devil's Wall, Dogtooth Violet, Eric Taylor, Country Stones, George Ensle, Don Sanders, Whiskey Dream

scopecontent.p: Listed performers include: Don Sanders, Cypress Swamp Stompers, Cade, George Ensle, Rick Dinsmore, Bill Haymes, Eric Taylor, Stephen Jarrard, Bill Staines, Dogtooth Violet
